extendedInfo.description: Easy Pc Control is a remote control for your computer!Developed in Java so it's multiplatform   (tested on Windows, Linux, Mac)It establishes a connection between your phone andyour computer and allows you to manage things like your mouse, the system volume and other kind of cool stuff. You just have to install the server applicationand Easy Pc Control in your Android device and you aregood to go!You can download the server app from here:http://www.estilonline.com/easypccontrolor here:http://www.filedropper.com/epcFeatures:- Mouse pad- Double tap- Drag and drop- Keyboard- Alt+Tab- Speech recognition (This is an experimental feature: types what you say to your phone in your PC)Windows only (for now..)- System volume - Mute Off/On- Screen Off/On- Suspend- ShutdownThank you all for your support, I wish you like it and if you have anyquestion or suggestion, don't hesitate to contact me!

reviews.title: Great but needs a mouse wheel!
reviews.comment: The app is simple to set up and simple to use but really does need a mouse wheel. Laptops use a strip at the edge of the mouse mat to scroll up and down, i think this would be a good addition. Apart from that this is great! Thanks.
reviews.author: Patrick McCaffrey

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This app needs some improvements for example the ability to adjust the sensitivity of the mouse. Also .,!? And other characters don\'t work. Otherwise very useful and SIMPLE app. Thanks and keep up the good work. Reddit is with you.
reviews.author: Yoel Singer

reviews.title: Well Done
reviews.comment: I personally use WiFi Mouse HD but it is nowhere near the quality of this app, thanks so much.
reviews.author: Velija Cohodar

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: Could add a screen share option, so you could see the screen from your phone, also, would be good if the jar file (computer file) opened when windows starts, i\'d personally like that feature, it could just be open in the programms tray thingy, so the window doesnt pop up everytime you run the application, all in all a great app so far. :)
reviews.author: Markii Edwards

reviews.title: Works briliantly
reviews.comment: This app truly is amazing. The wifi touch screen mouse is perfect and responds very fast. Excellent work Mr Developer  keep up the good work
reviews.author: Ashan Lazarus

reviews.title: Great in utility, but lacks in beauty.
reviews.comment: Everything works great! Responsive, and the extra features are nice too. Although I may have a bit of complaint: The interface isn\'t exactly what you can call nice and polished.You may need to have a major reboot on the interface.
reviews.author: Aldrin David Mallari

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait to see where this goes
reviews.author: Kevin Weis

reviews.title: Works great and easy to use
reviews.comment: This app works amazing perfect for when you are too lazy to get up and pause or go to the next show on your PC.  I love it!! Thank you and keep up the good work!
reviews.author: jonathan hazelton

reviews.title: Truly an outstanding app
reviews.comment: I may be a simpleton, but when I seamlessly started controlling my volume, keyboard, and mouse with my Galaxy S4 screen I was blown away.  This app is truly awesome and simple to use. No gimmicky buttons or unneeded templates, just a pure and simple layout that can let anyone (even a simpleton) navigate there PC with their smart phone.
reviews.author: Cal Stempel

reviews.title: Great! Only one issue...
reviews.comment: Fantastic app, works so easily and so smoothly. Only thing is typing doesn\'t work that well, like it\'ll skip letters I type or the word will just change. Nexus 4. Still love it and will use it because I don\'t need to type much! Keep if up!
reviews.author: Azeem Zaidi

reviews.title: Fantastic, really useful
reviews.comment: I use it every other day although some features need development, still a great app
reviews.author: Callum Urquhart

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: So far, this is really great. The keyboard isn\'t totally correct and is erasing some letters and adding extra ones here and there, so that would be something to fix. But other than that, this will really come in handy. Thank you!
reviews.author: Naomi Taub

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is a very good application! Very useful when you\'re computer is just out of reach!
reviews.author: Dipack Panjabi

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works pretty well. Still needs some minor updates
reviews.author: Oscar Xavier Guerrero

reviews.comment: Works very well, the touchpad is very responsive and it stays connected to my PC reliably.
reviews.author: Jeremy Becker

reviews.title: Cant find server, tried everything
reviews.comment: My pc and android cant contact cause there are no server (but is there)
reviews.author: Edson Oliveira

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.comment: Really looking forward to Linux support.
reviews.author: Jake Jacobs

reviews.title: Works like a charm
reviews.comment: Can use more features... But what can\'t
reviews.author: Brett Livingston

reviews.title: Simple and efficient
reviews.comment: Just what I\'ve been looking for! Easy interface that doesn\'t require a password everyone the program is opened. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Lots of options for free! I really love it
